promos.title: Read The Guardian in print
promos.body: A weekly, global magazine from The Guardian, with delivery worldwide. See the world more clearly.

promos.title: Digital subscription
promos.body: The Guardian Editions, Premium access to The Guardian Live app and ad-free reading on theguardian.com.

promos.title: A magazine that clarifies the news
promos.body: Immerse yourself in quality journalism with The Guardian Weekly. The most important stories paired with thoughtful analysis, opinion and in-depth features, plus the best of The Guardian's puzzles.
